definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: Winning his heat in a comfortable 14.02 seconds in front of 3500 people at Tseung Kwan O Sports Ground, Liu Xiang finally strode home with 13.66 seconds for the title.
sentences.chinese: 而在此前的預賽中，劉翔以14秒02輕鬆晉級。

sentences.english: He got through the preliminaries but lost out in the finals.
sentences.chinese: 他通過了預賽，但在決賽中輸掉了。

sentences.english: Liu pulled out injured just before the first heats of the event on Monday. "I'm ecstatic that I am Olympic champion.
sentences.chinese: 劉翔在本週一第一輪預賽前就因傷退出了比賽。

sentences.english: Liu Xiang failed to start his 110 metres hurdles first-round heat on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 週一，劉翔在110米欄第一輪預賽中起跑失敗。

sentences.english: He has easily won the preliminary contest for the high jump.
sentences.chinese: 他輕鬆地通過了跳高預賽。

sentences.english: Liu pulled out injured just before the first heats of the event on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 劉翔在本週一第一輪預賽前就因傷退出了比賽。

sentences.english: Following the preliminary round, Louganis went to a hospital and got five stitches.
sentences.chinese: 預賽結束後，盧甘尼斯去了醫院，傷口縫了5針。

sentences.english: Normally they swim preliminaries in the morning and finals in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 通常游泳運動員上午參加預賽，晚上參加決賽。

sentences.english: The total of 26 goals to date in the qualifiers is far greater than any other side in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 世預賽中的26個進球遠超其他歐洲任何球隊。

sentences.english: First class with the preliminaries, to elect representatives to participate in an outstanding field grade contest.
sentences.chinese: 先由各班進行預賽，選出一名優秀代表參加校級競賽。

sentences.english: After a month of preliminary contests , the TV Fashion and Modeling Competitions have entered the second round.
sentences.chinese: 預賽一個月後，電視時裝與模特大賽進入了第二輪。

sentences.english: On the first of my three qualifying jum , I leaped from several inches beyond the takeoff board for a foul.
sentences.chinese: 預賽三跳中的第一跳，我踏過起跳板幾英寸犯了現。

sentences.english: The preliminary competition for the women's 10-meter platform diving will be held this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 女子跳水10米跳臺預賽將在今天下午舉行。

definition: (sports) semifinal or quarterfinal/to compete in a semifinal (or a quarterfinal)
to compete/to take part (in a sports event)
preliminary contest/initial heats of a competition
competition schedule/the course of a race
